text: The JAC Refine A60 is a executive car made by JAC Motors from 2015 to 2020 it replaced the JAC Binyue that was also known as JAC J7. == History and Features == The JAC Refine A60 was previewed by the JAC Refine A6 concept shown at the Beijing Auto Show in 2014. the production version was shown at the Shanghai Auto Show in 2015. followed by the Guangzhou Auto Show in the same year it was planned to be launched in China in the start of 2016 but it was launched in November of the same year. The A60 was seen as the flagship model of the JAC Refine series. it has a design simillar to the Audi A6 the car has a 1.5 liter turbo petrol engine with a 6-speed DCT transmission it has a electric prototype version called IEVA60 this version was shown at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2018. and has a maximum range of 405 to 510 km. == Markets == The JAC Refine A60 was sold mainly in the Chinese market during its production run. == Discontinuation == The production of The A60 ended in 2020 and the car was discontinued without a sucessor. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: JAC Refine A60
